Title: The people's communes are good
Publisher: Jiangxi renmin chubanshe (江西人民出版社)
Notes: The Mao portrait that forms the central part of this poster is reminiscent of Ms. Hou Bo's photograph of Mao in the countryside of Henan, August 1958, standing in a grainfield wearing a straw hat, which was published as a poster in 1969.
